email_chain.subject: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear John, 

Hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to propose our vessel 'Ocean Carrier' for your upcoming crude oil shipment from Houston to Shanghai. Please find the initial details: Crude oil cargo approx. 70,000 MT. We are offering a competitive starting freight rate of USD 52.00 per ton. 

Looking forward to discussing this further. 

Best regards, 
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for the proposal. Given the location and cargo, USD 52.00 seems a bit high. Could you work on revised rates, possibly closer to the low 50s? Additionally, can you confirm the laycan dates and demurrage terms? 

Regards, 
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello John, 

Appreciate your feedback. I can probably work with USD 50.75 per ton. As per your request for laycan dates, we can set it for 10-15 October. Demurrage terms would stand at USD 25,000 per day. Please consider this and let me know your thoughts. 

Best, 
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thank you for the adjusted rate and details. Can we finalize at USD 50.50 per ton to seal the deal? Additionally, for the demurrage, would USD 22,000 per day be acceptable? 

Looking forward to your reply. 

Best regards, 
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
John, 

We can close the deal at USD 50.50 per ton, and agree on USD 22,000 for the demurrage per day. Let's proceed with this arrangement. I'll get the paperwork ready. 

Thank you for your cooperation. 
Best, 
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Proposal for Soybean Cargo
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to propose the chartering of the MV Ocean Carrier for your upcoming soybean shipment from Santos to Rotterdam. We're looking at a cargo size around 60,000 MT. The initial freight rate we're considering is in the low $50s per ton.

Please let me know your thoughts so we can discuss further.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Proposal for Soybean Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

Thank you for your proposal. Could you provide more details on the vessel's availability within the laycan period ending mid-October? Also, your initial rate is a bit higher than what we budgeted for. Could you consider high $40s per ton?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Proposal for Soybean Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I appreciate your quick response. I can confirm that MV Ocean Carrier is available for the specified laycan. Regarding the rate, meeting at $49.50 per ton could be feasible. Please let me know if this works for you so we can finalize the terms.

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Proposal for Soybean Cargo
email_chain.body:
Good morning Sarah,

$49.50 sounds reasonable. What about demurrage terms? We would also need some assurances on the vessel spec, particularly DWT and LOA.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Proposal for Soybean Cargo
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Glad to hear that the rate is acceptable. The MV Ocean Carrier has a deadweight of 75,000 MT and an overall length of 225 meters. As for demurrage, we suggest $25,000 per day. I look forward to closing this deal.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Proposal for Soybean Cargo
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Everything looks good. Please go ahead and draft the charter party agreement with the terms discussed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning John,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to discuss a potential shipment of crude oil from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel 'Sea Voyager' is available and can accommodate up to 70,000 MT. Could we discuss the freight rates and your terms for laycan dates?

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

Thank you for the quick response. We are interested in 'Sea Voyager'. Could you please provide the initial freight quote and expected laycan period? Also, what demurrage rates apply for this vessel?

Regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

For the 'Sea Voyager', the starting freight quote is in the low 50s USD/MT. The laycan period could be scheduled for mid-October. Demurrage is calculated at USD 25,000 per day. Please let me know if this works with your schedule so we can further discuss the details.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning Sarah,

The initial rates are a bit high. Could we aim for high 40s USD/MT instead? Also, can we adjust the laycan to start earlier in October? We are aiming to optimize our supply schedule.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

I've spoken with the vessel owners, and we can work towards your requested rate in the high 40s USD/MT and adjust the laycan to early October. However, to finalize this, could you confirm the volume and any specific terms or requirements on your side? This will help us lock down the details promptly.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

We can confirm the volume at 68,000 MT. As for the terms, we will stick to FOB Houston. Please go ahead and finalize the rates and dates. Looking forward to wrapping this up soon.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Agreement Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Excellent. I will finalize the booking of 'Sea Voyager' for 68,000 MT at a freight rate of $48.75/MT, laycan starting October 5th, demurrage at USD 25,000 per day. All terms will be provided in a formal contract for your review shortly.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Initial Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the M/V Seawind for your upcoming crude oil shipment from Port A to Port B. The vessel can accommodate up to 70,000 metric tons. We propose a starting freight rate of USD 2.50 per barrel, with a laycan period from 10th to 15th October. 

Please let me know your thoughts or any further information you may need.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

Thank you for the swift response. The vessel and laycan period seem suitable. However, we are seeing slightly lower rates in the market. Could you possibly match USD 2.35 per barrel? Also, could you provide the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your feedback. The M/V Seawind has a DWT of 120,000 tons and an LOA of 250 meters. Regarding the rate, the best we can do is USD 2.40 per barrel. We believe this is competitive given the current market conditions and the specifications of the vessel.

Kindly let me know if this works for you or if we should explore other options.

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Good morning, Sarah,

Thanks for the details and the revised offer. We are comfortable proceeding at USD 2.40 per barrel. Please confirm the demurrage terms and send over the charter party for us to review.

Best wishes,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Great to hear that! The demurrage terms are USD 25,000 per day. I will send you the draft charter party later today for your review. Please confirm the laytime dates so we can finalize the agreement.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the demurrage details. Laytime dates from 10th to 15th October are confirmed. Please include this in the charter party.

We look forward to concluding this efficiently.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the confirmation. I have updated the charter party with the laytime dates and sent it over for your signature. Once signed, we will be all set to proceed with the shipment.

Appreciate your cooperation.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out to discuss the upcoming shipment of 80,000 metric tons of crude oil from Port of Rotterdam to Port of Houston. Are you currently considering any vessels? We can offer competitive freight rates for this route. Regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hello Sarah, Thanks for reaching out. We are indeed in the process of sourcing a vessel for this shipment. Could you please provide more details on the vessels available, including DWT and LOA, and your initial freight quote? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, For your requirement, we suggest using the MT Liberty, a VLCC with 300,000 DWT and 330 meters LOA. We are initially quoting a freight of USD 52.00 per metric ton. Please let me know if this fits within your budget or if we should explore more options. Regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Sarah, Thanks for the information. The vessel looks suitable, but the freight quote is a bit higher than our budget. Could you potentially offer something closer to the low 50s? Also, could you specify the laycan and demurrage terms? Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: John, I appreciate your feedback. We can adjust the freight rate to USD 50.75 per metric ton. The laycan period would be from March 20th to March 25th. For demurrage, we're looking at USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Sarah, That sounds reasonable. We'll move forward with the MT Liberty at the adjusted rate and terms. Please send over the charter party agreement for our review. Thanks for accommodating our request. Best Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Proposal for crude oil transport from Valdez to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Dear John, I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out to discuss a potential opportunity for transporting crude oil from Valdez to Yokohama. We can offer the vessel M/N Oceanic Explorer, 150,000 DWT, available in the late September window. The starting freight quote is in the low $50s per ton. Please let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for crude oil transport from Valdez to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Hello Sarah, Thanks for your proposal. The vessel specs look good, but can we discuss a slightly lower rate? The current market conditions suggest we might consider something around $48 per ton. Also, what would be the demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for crude oil transport from Valdez to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for your quick response. I have checked with the owners, and we can potentially go down to $49.50 per ton. As for demurrage, we're looking at $20,000 per day. Does this work for you? Regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for crude oil transport from Valdez to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Sarah, Thanks for considering the rate adjustment. $49.50 per ton seems fair. On the demurrage, can we cap it at $18,000 per day? Otherwise, we are nearly good to finalize this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for crude oil transport from Valdez to Yokohama
email_chain.body: John, I've discussed with the vessel owners, and we're able to meet your demurrage rate of $18,000 per day. Shall we proceed with arranging the contract on this basis? Please confirm. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for crude oil transport from Valdez to Yokohama
email_chain.body: Sarah, That sounds great. Please proceed with the contract preparations. We'll review and revert once we have it. Thanks for all your efforts! Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Finalizing the Agreement – Crude Oil Transportation

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Port A to Port B

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Port A to Port B

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Port A to Port B

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Grain Shipment

Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Transport

The preferred laycan is Aug 25-30. We're initially looking at a rate in the low $50s per MT. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this. Regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for BT Peak Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body: Hello Sarah, Thanks for reaching out. The rate mentioned is quite tight considering the current market trends. Could we discuss a rate closer to $55 per MT? Additionally, could you provide the vessel details including DWT and LOA? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for BT Peak Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body: Hi John, Appreciate your swift response. The vessel in prospect, MV Sunrise Glory, has a DWT of around 75,000 tonnes and an LOA of 225 meters. Regarding the rate, given the vessel’s specifications and our long-standing partnership, could we settle at $53 per MT? Regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for BT Peak Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body: Sarah, Thank you for the details. MV Sunrise Glory seems appropriate for our needs. Meeting midway at $53 is acceptable. Please proceed with the necessary documentation. What's the demurrage rate applied for this fixture? Thank you, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for BT Peak Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body: Morning John, Great to hear that! We'll proceed with the rate of $53 per MT. The demurrage is set at USD 20,000 per day. We'll start drafting the charter party and get it over for your review shortly. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for BT Peak Crude Oil Transport - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Everything looks good. I confirm our agreement on the freight at $53 per MT and demurrage at $20,000 per day. Please proceed with finalizing the charter party. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Fujairah to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John, 

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to propose the cargo shipment of crude oil, specifically 150,000 MT, from Fujairah to Rotterdam. We can offer the M/T Atlantic Sun, which is a 160,000 DWT vessel, suitable for your needs. Our starting freight rate stands at $52.00 per MT. Please let me know your thoughts or if you'd like to discuss the specifics over a call. 

Best regards, 
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Fujairah to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah, 

Thank you for your proposal. The details look good, but I am currently looking at rates slightly lower than what you've offered. Would you be able to come down to $50.50 per MT? Also, can you confirm the vessel's LOA and the estimated laycan period? 

Thanks, 
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Fujairah to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Thank you for your swift response. We can certainly discuss the rates further. How about meeting halfway at $51.25 per MT? Regarding the vessel, M/T Atlantic Sun has a LOA of 274 meters. The proposed laycan is scheduled from November 5th to November 10th. Does that work for you? 

Kind regards, 
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Fujairah to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sarah, 

$51.25 per MT sounds reasonable. The laycan period is also suitable. Can you please provide details on the demurrage terms? 

Best, 
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Fujairah to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Morning John, 

Glad to hear that works for you. Regarding demurrage, we are looking at $26,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations and we can finalize the terms. 

Best regards, 
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment from Fujairah to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

The demurrage rate is acceptable. Please draft the charter party agreement with the discussed terms, and let’s aim to have this finalized by end of the week. 

Thank you, 
John

email_chain.subject: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The approximate cargo size is 70,000 MT. Could you please provide us with your best initial freight rate? Also, we are targeting a laycan between March 15th to 20th.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

Thank you for reaching out. Based on the current market situation, our starting freight quote would be in the mid 50s USD per MT. We can discuss the vessel specifics and potential discounts on a follow-up call.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for the quick response. The starting rate seems a bit high considering the market trends. Could we possibly explore a rate closer to the low 50s USD per MT? Additionally, can you provide details on the vessel type and any applicable demurrage rates?

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

We can consider adjusting the freight rate to $52.50 per MT. The vessel available is the MV Ocean Trader, a crude oil tanker with a DWT of 105,000 MT and LOA of 250 meters. Demurrage would be at $25,000 USD per day. Let’s finalize the details if this is acceptable to you.

Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Morning John,

The revised rate and demurrage terms are acceptable. Please confirm the laycan dates and prepare the charter party agreement. We want to move forward as soon as possible to secure these terms.

Thanks,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Rate Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed for laycan March 15th to 20th. I'll send over the charter party agreement by tomorrow for your review. Looking forward to finalizing everything.

Regards,
John

email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Bulk Grain Shipment
email_chain.body:

$50.25 sounds reasonable. Please confirm the laycan dates and could you also provide the vessel's LOA and DWT for our logistics team? Additionally, could you specify the demurrage terms?

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Bulk Grain Shipment

I’ve confirmed with the vessel owners; the laycan period can be set from October 15th to October 17th. The vessel’s LOA is 200 meters and DWT is 50,000 MT. Regarding demurrage, the rate is set at $16,500 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works out and we can proceed to draw up the charter party.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Bulk Grain Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

Everything seems in order. Please go ahead and prepare the necessary documents for our final review. Assuming all is in alignment, we look to finalize this promptly.

email_chain.subject: Offer for Crude Oil Transportation - MV Oceanic Star

The available laycan period is from September 20th to September 25th. Our starting freight rate is quoted in the low 50s USD/MT. Please review and let me know your thoughts.

Also, could you confirm if demurrage terms stand at USD 25,000 daily?

John

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Crude Oil Transportation - MV Oceanic Star
email_chain.body:

I appreciate your quick feedback. I've discussed with the owners, and we can potentially meet at a rate of $47.50/MT. Regarding the demurrage, yes, the rate is as stated at USD 25,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your expectations so we can proceed further.

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Crude Oil Transportation - MV Oceanic Star
email_chain.body:

John

email_chain.subject: Charter Party Agreement & Confirmation - MV Oceanic Star
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Great! I'm glad we've reached an agreement. Attached you'll find the draft charter party agreement for the carriage of crude oil from Ras Tanura to Yeosu aboard the MV Oceanic Star. The agreed freight rate is $47.50/MT, with demurrage terms at USD 25,000 per day.

Please review and sign at your earliest convenience.

Warm regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment - MV Oceanic
email_chain.body:

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to discuss an available vessel, MV Oceanic, for your crude oil transport requirement from Port of Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel's deadweight is 150,000 DWT with a length overall of 275 meters.

email_chain.body:

email_chain.body:

Appreciate your feedback. I've discussed the rate with the owners and can stretch to USD 2.35 per metric ton. For laycan, the vessel can be made available from October 20-25. Regarding demurrage, our rate stands at USD 25,000 per day.

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment - MV Oceanic
email_chain.body:

Thanks for the revised rate and the laycan flexibility. We can work with the rate of USD 2.35 per metric ton. However, we are hoping you could consider USD 22,000 per day for demurrage to close this deal.

Awaiting your response,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment - MV Oceanic
email_chain.body:

Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Shipment - MV Oceanic
email_chain.body:

Appreciate your efforts in meeting us midway on the demurrage rates. Let's proceed with the rate of USD 2.35 per metric ton and demurrage of USD 23,500/day. Please send over the necessary charter party documents for us to review and sign.

John

Hope this message finds you well. We are looking to transport a cargo of crude oil from Valdez to Rotterdam. The vessel we are considering is the MT Sea Voyager, which has a DWT of approximately 150,000 tons and an LOA of 270 meters.

We are initially quoting a freight rate in the mid 50s per metric ton. Please let us know your thoughts on this and any other specifications you might require.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for your email. The initial quote sounds reasonable, but I would like to propose a rate in the low 50s considering the current market conditions. Also, could you confirm the laycan dates and the expected demurrage terms?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Thanks for your swift response. I'll check the possibility of adjusting the freight rate. Regarding laycan, we can schedule it for anywhere between October 20th and 25th. As for demurrage, we are currently at $30,000 per day.

I'll revert shortly regarding the freight rate.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

The laycan dates work for us. Please confirm as soon as you can on the freight rate. If you can manage to meet our proposed rate, I think we have a deal.

Regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
John,

Good news! We can meet your proposed freight rate of low 50s per ton. Shall we proceed with drawing up the charter party? Also, I'll need your confirmation on the demurrage rate.

Looking forward to closing this smoothly.
Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Fantastic! We agree to the freight rate and confirm the demurrage at $30,000 per day. Please proceed with the charter party.

Excited to finalize everything.
Cheers,
John

Hope this message finds you well. I wanted to start our discussion regarding the cargo shipment of crude oil you're looking to charter. Based on current market conditions and the details provided, the starting freight rate for transport from Port A to Port B is proposed at mid-50 USD per ton.

Please review this preliminary quote and let me know your thoughts. I look forward to working closely with you to finalize the details.

Sarah

email_chain.body:

Also, could you provide more details on the vessel you plan to use, including DWT and LOA?

John

Additionally, regarding the freight rate, we can tentatively go as low as $52 per ton. Let me know if this is more acceptable, and we can continue our negotiations from there.

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.body:

Also, can you specify the laycan period and propose terms for demurrage?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Initial Freight Rate Proposal for Crude Oil Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Understood on your price point. We can agree to $51.25 per ton. For the laycan, we are looking at the window from October 5th to October 10th.

Regarding demurrage, we propose $25,000 per day, which is standard for this vessel size and cargo.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements so we can proceed further.

Thanks,
Sarah

email_chain.body:

Thanks for considering our position. We agree to the freight rate of $51.25 and the demurrage terms. The laycan period is also acceptable. I think we are close to finalizing things.

Please prepare the formal contract with these terms and send it over for our final review.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request for Bulk Grain Shipment
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Crude Oil Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Good morning John,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to discuss an opportunity for transporting crude oil from Rotterdam to Houston. We have a suitable vessel available, the MV Horizon, with a DWT of 150,000 MT. The laycan period is flexible around late April to early May.

The initial freight quote stands at US$51 per MT. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the proposal. Could you provide more details on the vessel’s LOA and whether it is ice-class? Additionally, considering the market trends, we were aiming for something in the low 50s. Can we discuss $49.75 per MT?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Hello John,

Thank you for your prompt response. The MV Horizon has an LOA of 274 meters and is not currently ice-class. Regarding the freight rate, while I appreciate your position, $49.75 is a bit challenging. Could we meet halfway at $50.25 per MT?

Please let me know if this works for you or if we should continue negotiating.

Warm regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Morning Sarah,

I appreciate you meeting us halfway. $50.25 per MT is acceptable. Let's go ahead with that rate. Could you please provide the terms for demurrage?

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Good Morning John,

That's great to hear. The demurrage rate will be US$25,000 per day. We foresee the laytime to be about 3 days for loading at Rotterdam and 4 days for discharging at Houston. If all terms are agreed, I will prepare the charter party contract for your review.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Crude Oil Cargo Transport
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

All terms look good. Please proceed with preparing the charter party contract. I look forward to receiving it.

Thanks,
John
